problem.markdown:
After adding VEE to the shape list, clicking the flag will draw: ( ) same as before ( ) same of little vee ( ) same of double vee ( ) same or two double vees (x) something else
[explanation] Ok, this one is a little unfair -- it's asking you to predict what will happen on the next flag click. Actually it could be the same as before, it could be a double vee, it could be two double vees, and it could be something else. The only thing it can't be is a little vee (option b). So any of a, c, d, or e are correct, actually. [explanation]
problem.p: After adding VEE to the shape list, clicking the flag will draw:

div.p: Ok, this one is a little unfair -- it's asking you to predict what will happen on the next flag click. Actually it could be the same as before, it could be a double vee, it could be two double vees, and it could be something else. The only thing it can't be is a little vee (option b). So any of a, c, d, or e are correct, actually.
